text: @realDonaldTrump You have people even in peaceful areas that are on edge bc of covid-19 the riots and finances such as our family which is roughly 33% short of what we used to have. Now government officials, like code enforcers, are harassing, provoking, citizens like never before. Stop Riots NOW
